title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 490/88 of 22 February 1988 temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on a number of agricultural products falling within code numbers 0713 33 90 and 1212 20 00 of the combined nomenclature
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 490/88
of 22 February 1988
temporarily suspending the autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties on a number of agricultural products falling within code numbers 0713 33 90 and 1212 20 00 of the combined nomenclature
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The autonomous Common Customs Tariff duties for the products listed in the Annex hereto shall be suspended at the level indicated against each of them.
The said suspension shall be valid from 1 March to 30 June 1988.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 March 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 February 1988.
For the Council
The President
H.-D. GENSCHER
ANNEX
1.2.3 //  //  //  // CN code   // Description of goods  // Autonomous duties (%)   //    //   //   // ex 0713 33 90  // Beans, white, dried, of the species Phaseolus vulgaris, of which not more than 2 % by weight are retained by a screen with apertures of 8 mm in diameter, for use in the food-canning industry (a)   // 0   // ex 1212 20 00   // Seaweeds and other algae, for the processing industry, other than for the production of animal fodder (a)   // 0   //    //   //
(a) Control of the use for this special purpose shall be carried out pursuant to the relevant Community provisions.
